website_summaries.verdict: A short spray of Febreze AIR is like a reset button for removing odors, including trash, cat box, and other ordinary household smells from your home.
pros: Twice the smell-eliminating power of regular-strength Febreze
Safe for use around dogs and cats

customer_reviews.title: Great for Ridding Your Home of Unwanted Odors
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job masking cigarette smoke and certain herbal scents you may want your neighbors detecting if you live in an apartment. And by herbal scents, of course I mean Bay Leaves. Who wants their neighbors knowing how much potato soup they're consuming on the daily? I don't! Be an inoffensive neighbor. Stock up on these Febreze 3-packs!
customer_reviews.author: L. Parent

customer_reviews.title: Don't go #2 without this #1 air freshener!!!
customer_reviews.text: I work in an office with one bathroom shared by 10 people. We've used all the air fresheners out there, including Poo-Pouri which is really a joke. I saw the commercial for this and figured it was worth a shot. This is hands down, the very best air freshener ever! It really makes the vicious bathroom odors disappear! The scent is very neutral and best of all, doesn't leave a floral bouquet trail to let your coworkers know you made a deposit. Totally worth it and highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: SCAM!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package and when I removed the bottles I noticed they were light. I removed the wrapper and discovered the bottle is not full. I then sprayed it and it smells nothing like the product I always buy from the store. Dont know what this mess is. DONT BUY!!! I'm very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Best air freshener I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This will cover the smell of a dead cow! Best air freshener I have ever used. We use it around the cat box and rabbit pen. Just a short spray, and I mean short, means we can use the restroom right after our teenage son, so that says a lot!!! Seriously!
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job!
customer_reviews.text: This febreeze works well and quick. My only reason for the four star is because it tends to leave a residue on tile and hard surfaces. While the product is great and lasts a long time, I plan to try something different next time. I’ve purchased this several times. Air was less expensive than Sam’s on my last purchase so Amazon got the business! It works well but be careful with the residue it may leave behind.
customer_reviews.author: Luvnmac

customer_reviews.title: and definitely eliminates odors much better. Not sure what the new plastic bottom is ...
customer_reviews.text: This new version of the same heavy duty "Crisp Clean Air" has a slighty nicer smell to it, and definitely eliminates odors much better. Not sure what the new plastic bottom is all about, but that gives me no reason to give is a lower rating like others have done, just because Febreze didn't explain to me the reason for the re-design. The bottle doesn't function any lesser, and the effectiveness of the contents are stronger. 5 solid stars in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G.

customer_reviews.title: The very best air freshener that I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: The best air freshener that I have ever used. I broiled a steak and after dinner I used three squirts of this Febreze Crisp, clean and all odors disappeared. A very fresh, clean scent remained, no lingering cooking odors. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Febreze 2x is the best!
customer_reviews.text: 2x febreze is a must purchase for us. Hubby has Chrons, febreeze2x is a major help with bathroom odor. I used to buy 9 at a time, but I don't believe it is offerred anymore.Febreeze
customer_reviews.author: Eaglesmom

customer_reviews.title: Faulty cans
customer_reviews.text: This item would have been great but I ended up with faulty cans. They wouldn’t spray anything. This is a nonreturnable it.. Thank goodness Amazon gave me a refund. Hopefully this was a one off. It’s a really good product.
customer_reviews.author: Real reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs and live in an apartment with all carpeting. I use this stuff all the time. I vacuum every day and am constantly cleaning, so I feel like the dog smell never goes away. However, the only complaint that I do have with this is that the smell does not last very long. Definitely works longer than other products, but not as long as I would have hoped for. I use it on the couch, blankets, the dog beds, etc. You can for sure smell it a few hours after which is nice, but overall it is an amazing product! highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laura V

customer_reviews.title: Check spray nozzles right away!
customer_reviews.text: The nozzle on these air fresheners don't work in the way you'd expect. I missed the return window, so now I'm stuck with multiple bottles of air freshener that I can't spray.
customer_reviews.author: Nesha1075

customer_reviews.title: Can't stand the smell
customer_reviews.text: It is sooooooooooo perfume-y and I can't seem to get rid of it. It's making me nauseous and it's being returned!
customer_reviews.author: Animal lover

customer_reviews.title: I'm an Uber driver and I get compliments on how my car ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm an Uber driver and I get compliments on how my car smells constantly. Whether you use this for business or personal, having a great smelling area makes a huge impact on others. Can't say enough how great this is!
customer_reviews.author: Dizzle

customer_reviews.title: Effective But Unplesant Odor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3 pack of Fabreze because I've used the product in the past and it always made my apartment smell fresh. I was surprised to find that this version (billed as heavy duty with a clean, crisp scent) actually produces an overwhelming, fruity odor. Although it does kill unpleasant odors, the product's own smell is so unpleasant I hate using it. Won't try this again. I gave it 3 stars for being effective.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia47

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the aroma of a cat's litter box over the chemical strangulation of this god awful air freshener.
customer_reviews.author: Confused Middle-aged White Male

customer_reviews.title: Bad spray design
customer_reviews.text: So I just "finished" my third canister. Honestly, it's just a strong lemon scent that smells above average. It's not amazing, but it gets the job done. The problem I had with all three of my canisters is the spray strength. When there's 1/3 left of the spray, it will lose about 90% of its strength. It turns into a stream and just gets everything wet. I probably got a bad batch or rough shipping but I'm disappointed. I bought 3 cans but only got 2 technically.
customer_reviews.author: tombchill

customer_reviews.title: Intolerable scent
customer_reviews.text: This product has the most intolerable scent. The fragrance is described as "Crisp Clean" which sounds rather light and crisp and clean. Beware. My daughter began to cough and did not stop until all the windows in the house were opened. My response was worse. I made my way to the bathroom feeling as though I was going to vomit. So... what do I do with 3 canisters of this stuff?
customer_reviews.author: cynthia mayeshiro

customer_reviews.title: I love febreeze, but usually get original scent. Not as happy with this scent.
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of febreeze. It definitely gets rid of odors. I normally buy the fresh scent with gain. We have been having some plumbing done on our sewer so I bought this 2X heavy duty febreeze, it has a bit of a chemical smell to it, not the normal fresh scent of regular febreeze. I won’t buy this scent again because it leaves a strong weird smell. I’ll go back to the original scent with gain. That version is 5 stars because it eliminates odor and leaves a soft scent, nothing chemical about the other scent.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye work bathroom odors...
customer_reviews.text: I like these because it isn't a ridiculously heavy scent, and eliminates the odors, NOT just mask them a little (so many others just kinda add to the smell, so it's like poop & cinnamon or whatever). Great to have in the office ladies room
customer_reviews.author: Ellie B

customer_reviews.title: Pungent clean smell
customer_reviews.text: It’s like a wet blanket of febreeze scent but on steroids. Not in the best way possible. It’s a bit sickly like those cheap candles with that gawd awful smell. I would not recommend this. It is no odor eliminator. Just overpowers the odor you are trying to get rid of and then fades away. No return policy which sucks because now I have these for no use. On a second thought, I can use them to overwhelm any burglars by dual wielding these sprays. That ought to keep them at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Covers up the stank
customer_reviews.text: This is the best for when you blow up the bathroom and need to cover up the stank. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Clean air without an overpowering fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Great spray to refresh rooms where pets and little boys live and play. :} I'm glad to find this mild fragrance in the $$ saving three pack as it is not irritating to our nose and lungs.
customer_reviews.author: A. T. Granmommie

customer_reviews.title: Not for me!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using Febreze Linen and Sky, which smells like baby powder, and I absolutely loved it, but when I saw this, I decided to try it. Sorry I ordered the three pack. This is so overpowering. It smells more flowery than fresh. I will buy linen and sky for all future buys. If you are very sensitive to certain smells, I recommend something else. really want to try the “Ocean“ scent, but now I’m scared.
customer_reviews.author: Magic

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick! Clears the air pronto! Excellent healthy scented refresher!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I purchased these! My old house towel and blanket closets needed a refresher. This spray does the trick! No more old house closet smell! Now my blankets and towels are cleaned and organized and the closets smell fresh! Super good for the bathroom too! Clears the air instantly with a clean healthy scent. Having two dogs and used multiple brand sprays over the years, this stuff wins hands down!!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Hill

customer_reviews.title: Ugh Rd doe
customer_reviews.text: The item is great and I purchase a lot off febreeze items but but spray cap on 2 off the cans did not work. I got upset and threw on which I ended up putting in the trash after my temper tantrum the doesn’t spray it just trickles a stream of product. The sent is awesome and it de eliminate orders. I purchased one from Kroger and I love it. Go figure... don’t know why the sprayer is unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: What a RIPOFF!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchase this set of 3pack Air heavy duty Febreze packs before. One of the cans came empty. What a total ripoff. Manufacturer should be ashamed!
customer_reviews.author: G.Faison

customer_reviews.title: Propellant leaks out.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these spray aerosols very quickly ran short of the propellant inside of the container allowing the contents to spray out. Thus, you're left with product in the container that you can't spray. This happened with all three air fresheners. Even after vigorously shaking them. If you continue to squeeze the spray trigger the contents leak out of the container making a mess. I am not sure what went wrong with these items considering they're made on a production line. I will have to contact Febreeze (P & G).
customer_reviews.author: Al of Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Poop in privacy without alerting everyone near by
customer_reviews.text: Never used the product before, but noticed it at Target one day but didn't buy it. Decided to order it on Amazon, as I've never been able to find a great air freshener for the bathroom. It always ends up smelling like "Poop flowers". Anyway, this covers it up pretty damn well and my guests don't walk around looking guilty after they have used the rest room.
customer_reviews.author: JUST ME!

customer_reviews.title: Smells lovely but...
customer_reviews.text: It smells lovely but it would be great if it have disinfectant spray in it too! I spray it after seeing patients and a lot of them are homeless and have a bad lingering smell so the febreze works wonders to cover it up I just wish it also had a disinfectant like Lysol
customer_reviews.author: Natasha R

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Okay honestly, just go buy spray at the dollar store lol these are very expensive for spray that barely lasts. They smell like peach rings when I was expecting a fresh summer scent. If you like the smell of artifical peach rings, you will like it, but to me it is just not worth the price. However, it did do its job.
customer_reviews.author: motley

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken, ineligible for return
customer_reviews.text: One of the three bottles in my pack arrived broken. There is no sprayer. It was not in the box, which makes me believe I was sent a faulty product. Disappointed that this is deemed “ineligible” for returns. Aside from that, the scent is SO strong. If you are sensitive to scents, this will give you a headache.
customer_reviews.author: dng

customer_reviews.title: The sprayer doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Good luck getting the spray to work consistently. Most of the time the spray is non-existent or VERY weak. This "package" is very disappointing. I'll opt for whatever I can get in the manual spray from now on. I'd always prefer refillable. This version is not exactly "heavy-duty," even though that's why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: S.P. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, clean scent and a well designed bottle help ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is another win for Febreze! Excellent, clean scent and a well designed bottle help this product freshen up the home, eliminating pet scents and more! The trigger is fantastic for disbursing an even and continuous spray throughout the area, and the fresh smell lasts for hours, neutralizing odors. Will definitely be keeping this product on repeat order status!
customer_reviews.author: SeanS

customer_reviews.title: Fresh smell, doesn't irritate asthma
customer_reviews.text: I've been spending more time in the apartment during the pandemic. I'm sure others are in a similar situation. This air freshener helps keep the apartment smelling fresh and this type doesn't trigger my asthma. The three pack is a good value and has lasted for a while. I'm on bottle 2 of 3 and will likely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It's Essentially Effective in My Own Eyes:
customer_reviews.text: These products are getting things done in the matter of seconds from the brand I've known best for years. I highly recommended it altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Valdez-Rivera

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok probably should just buy in store if able to
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to needing to use the second bottle of my three pack and it doesn’t spray at all. No I didn’t break it or damage it . It’s been sitting on the shelf next to the bottle I used all the time until it went empty . The scent and Odor eliminator could be better . Not the worst but not the best I’ve had before .
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: Not like same stuff in store. less oz and after awhile will not spray
customer_reviews.text: All three bottles stopped spraying, shaking full bottles, and nothing comes out very annoying. Brick and mortar stores bottles still work. Thinking maybe a knockoff
customer_reviews.author: FrankieBoy

customer_reviews.title: During our pandemic we need to smell ANYTHING OTHER THAN MY MAX & FEBREZE IS IT
customer_reviews.text: ITS MY FAVORITE SCENT,helps eliminate THE SMELL OF MAX OUR ROTTWEILER FAMILY MEMBER WHOM SOMETIMES SMELLS LIKE SOMETHING THE CAT DRAGGED IN AND THAN SOME EWW 😷.works on any and all ODORS I PROMISE YOU AND TRY Febreze FABRIC REFRESHER,I LOVE CRISP CLEAN AND UNSTOPPABLES FRESH USE FOR YOUR MAX ODORS ON COUCHES,BEDDING,EVEN CARPET AND CLOTHES BEFORE YOU HEAD OUT THE DOOR AND EVEN YOUR CAR,MICHELLE D HOUSTON
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D Houston

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I'm super sensitive to these kinds of sents. We had bought a bunch of random stuff we had found here and there, and finally bought something that smelled like Axe body spray that just was gag inducing. I looked at the reviews and decided on this. It still has a pretty decent chemical smell, but it does a good job of covering the smell of dookie, and isn't so obnoxious that you dread spraying.
customer_reviews.author: Bizarro Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't spray
customer_reviews.text: We love this smell and decided to order the three pack. After a few uses, it didn't spray. So far, 2 out of 3 have not worked properly. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: The Gavinet’s

customer_reviews.title: Good air freshener with odor eliminator that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these air fresheners! It puts out consistently throughout from full to empty with no harmful aerosols! It eliminates the toughest scents and actually keeps the scent away. I buy 3 at a time to keep from having to reorder so much, and at this price with free shipping, it's well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Stonehill

customer_reviews.title: Great product, broken bottles that don’t work :(
customer_reviews.text: I order this on subscribe and save and each time 1 or 2 (this time) of the bottles arrive with the spray function broken and I have not been able to fix them. So I am paying for broken and unusable items. The item is not returnable. Save your money and just buy this at the grocery store or elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Stink be gone!
customer_reviews.text: We have cats. Need I say more? This formulation really works well and I don't need to spray much of it to get the desired effect One or two short bursts sndnoders go away!
customer_reviews.author: Euphist

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely the best. Gets rid of odors super fast and leaves a nice clean fragrance. Would buy again and again. Only com[plaint I would have is that the contents seems to go very fast for some reason. Still I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Squiggy

customer_reviews.title: Good for cigarette smoke.
customer_reviews.text: Gets rid of cigarette smoke for the most part, not completely but i would say it elliminates 90% of the smell which is better than nothing! The odor is very pleasant like fresh laundry, and it isn't too strong, and the fragrance doesn't linger for too long. It gets the job done. Very happy with Febreze.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant buying a scent online without being able to smell it first but this produce is awesome. Great to use around the litter boxes. Eliminates odor quickly and smells great afterwards. Definitely recommend for tough smells, works better than typical Febreze!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: We have been using this all during the Covid-9 time.
customer_reviews.text: We ran out of spray disinfectant and started using this instead. The best part is the misty spray covers everts so well. Love the container design too,, sleek and easy to hold. Use this also after making fish for dinner and after making tuna fish for lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad scent
customer_reviews.text: I was unhappy with the scent of the product. It was somehow worse than bleach. Which I did not think possible. I love Febreze and will continue to use their other products. Just not this scent.
customer_reviews.author: Mickie

customer_reviews.title: frickn awsome
customer_reviews.text: this stuff did exactly what it says it will do, NOT mask oder and have a foul smell, removed the smell out of a room my daughter lived in for 10 years WITH door shut :) . she moved out and the smell went with her after spraying this in room! CLICK IF HELP FULL
customer_reviews.author: Bears

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of all the bad smells
customer_reviews.text: The Febreeze spray does a great job of neutralizing odors from trash and food in the air. I only need to spray around the trash once and it doesn't smell for a long time. The actual smell of the Febreeze doesn't last that long but it gets rid of the other smells really well.
customer_reviews.author: Nirmal Sadayappan

customer_reviews.title: 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.text: Whoa this stuff smells so good and it is POWERFUL! I sprayed some when it first came in the mail to test it out and my living room smelled notably fresh for a while after. I even asked my fiancé if he could smell it and he said yes it smells good! It’s not an overwhelming scent either. Just smells fresh 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Huber

customer_reviews.title: Febreze AIR Freshener Heavy Duty is your answer to fowl odors.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for odor elimination and one short spray will clear the odor leaving a light scent in your room, unless the room is an open, large space, it will require more sprays around the room. I cannot confirm how many sprays would be required to eliminate the pungent odor of cigar smoke! Not my problem!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Ann

customer_reviews.title: Thanks. Good stuff for home.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you. Perfect freestandi g spray bottle products. Only one was leaking out of nine but I adjusted it and worked fine. All work fine. Do not shake only spray around the room or house. Most I liked is no allergic reactions and worked reasonably great.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: A Great Scent !
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the "scent". It is not as Strong However it does it's job.purchasing three at a time was really GOOD for Me,one upstairs ,the second I us in the living room,the kitchen bottle I use downstairs,the third I use in the Basement. This actually worked Great as We had a Flood in Our Basement (due to the Electric going off.) Without it I would had to go to the store ,as the wet basement had a "smell from being wet".
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: 2x is the only way to go
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Febreze air freshener to get for your bathroom! It eliminates odors right away and smells fantastic. Worth the money. I highly highly recommend it. It’s all I buy now for the bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha G

customer_reviews.title: Always having it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has an ostomy. We always keep this product available. His dignity is very important to me. I know that any odors will be eliminated immediately when I stay the Fabreze Heavy Duty odor eliminator. To me, it is so much more than just an air freshener. It is an essential and dignity/modesty saving miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Gassaway

customer_reviews.title: The only place I have found to get a three-pack
customer_reviews.text: This particular 2X variety is usually included as only one in a three pack of other scents. This is the only place I have found to get this particular 2X strength and scent in a three-pack. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bill

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS!  When airing out stuffiness.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great added help to plug ins. Especially during the winter season when everything is stuffy and closed up (fully carpeted) terrace and windows all usually closed ew! Always a good time to have air deodorizers in hand!
customer_reviews.author: Just looking

customer_reviews.title: It’s a no for me...
customer_reviews.text: Against my better judgment, I ordered these even after reading the bad reviews. We have 4 foster kittens and their area of the house gets pretty smelly sometimes so I was looking for something to combat their odors. This stuff smells.... really bad. Not pleasant at all. I read some reviews speculating that these were a knock off of the real heavy duty febreeze and now I believe that that’s probably true. Save your money and just purchase at Walmart or Target.
customer_reviews.author: B V

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle on your senses
customer_reviews.text: I normally can't take any strong smell even if it is good, I feel really suffocated. This one has a gentle but long lasting smell, which is the reason I love it
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates the litterbox odor
customer_reviews.text: 3 cats, 4 litter boxes, lots of smell, awful, hideous, gross, stinky smells, but this spray does make the odor go away (until the next time they do their business). It smells nice, and it really does work.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Basically Unscented
customer_reviews.text: The "2X" actually means something. This is more effective, with less spray, than the standard Febreze. The scent is hardly noticeable, which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Pop Bop

customer_reviews.title: It’s mediocre at best:-/
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product but lately the spray canister have been defective. Half way through the canister you find it very difficult to get good coverage when you spray. And it’s form sour very chunky and could leave a wet stain on delicate fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Garcia

customer_reviews.title: The product in the bottle is fine / the sprayer is terrible
customer_reviews.text: These bottles just don't spray a fine mist. I threw on to as all it did was send a stream to the floor. Like it said on the bottle, I don't shake it. Just squeeze the trigger and sadly, the mist is not a mist, but a stream.
customer_reviews.author: CrankinSteve

customer_reviews.title: BROKE ON FIRST SPRAY
customer_reviews.text: Of the 3, 1 broke on the first spray. The finger trigger pull cracked and flattened against the can. Tried to revive the little sucker, but dead right there. Price fair for 3 but don't count on 3.
customer_reviews.author: Patron

customer_reviews.title: Love this spray - delivery was awful
customer_reviews.text: Don't order this in the wintertime. Amazon Fulfillment Center does not pack these very well for traveling in sub-zero temps. The three cans arrived leaking - I think they are frozen. I'm a little nervous to spray them in case they blow or fizz. The product is, however, very good - this is my second order of it.
customer_reviews.author: DSC

customer_reviews.title: Smells do good.
customer_reviews.text: This heavy duty stuff is fabulous. I use the Linen and Sky for regular odors and I use this heavy duty stuff for cooking odors and in the bathroom. This is a nice smelling air freshener. Eliminates odors immediately. I am on auto delivery for this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Helen E. T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: 2X more effective than Regular Febreze
customer_reviews.text: This fragrance is able to overpower strong odors, more effectively than regular Febreze. We use in bathrooms, laundry baskets, cars, pet bedding, and mud rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Smell good & last long but the sprays give out while spraying.
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of this spray and how long it lasts. The only issue I have been having is the spray keeps giving out while spraying and the bottles are not empty. Since they come with 3 I've had to throw some away.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Cruz

customer_reviews.title: It's way stronger than usual.
customer_reviews.text: It has a very strong scent which is a good thing if you're trying to get rid of odor. Very strong. I won't buy regular Fabreeze again. This is my go to from now on.
customer_reviews.author: TravisDaDrunk

customer_reviews.title: Effective but scent is awful, extremely cloying.
customer_reviews.text: The scent is extremely cloying and hard to inhale after spraying. I see this being used in places frequented by large groups- like a school gym. Did not like for my small bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Mima

customer_reviews.title: One doesn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: One just shoots a straight stream. The other 2 work just fine. The scent of the 2 that work smell pleasant and take care of any unpleasant order really well. I just wish the 3rd one worked as is I paid for 3.
customer_reviews.author: johnnie kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: Febreze AIR Freshener Heavy Duty Crisp Clean,
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as scheduled. Has a great smell and really takes care of orders including cooking orders when barbecuing in doors or frying. Will definitely order this again.
customer_reviews.author: white tooth

customer_reviews.title: Every married couple needs this
customer_reviews.text: My wife says that she just wishes that this company could invent a beer but eliminate for me. She also said that unfortunately this doesnt work on my personality or my looks but at least I smell better
customer_reviews.author: BTDun

customer_reviews.title: Replaces litter box smell with pleasant scent
customer_reviews.text: Six indoor cats. Undesirable litter box smell. Used this spray, the cat litter smell is gone and replaced by a pleasant scent. Definitely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Terry R. Nye

customer_reviews.title: It's fruity?!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I got this that it smells fruity. I was exprecting fresh linen. We will keep them, but for someone who is sensitive to scents, beware it is strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Zeltinger

customer_reviews.title: Removes foul odors well
customer_reviews.text: Does its job as you would expect any febreeze too but not a fan of the scent. It said air so I expected the scent to be similar to the original scent but smells more like lavender or grape fruit. Tolerable but personally wanted a cleaner, fresh smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Worthless! Clogs or trigger gets stuck after couple uses...
customer_reviews.text: Third time I’ve bought this three pack & every single can either clogs up & won’t spray, or the trigger gets stuck, just used a brand new can & second spray it’s already locked up!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Smells too strong
customer_reviews.text: I like febreze, but this one is way too strong a smell!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: A must for litter box scooping
customer_reviews.text: I like the fresh clean scent that dissipates odors and doesn't leave a fragrance other than "clean" - I don't care for for floral, fruity, etc. scents. I will always keep this on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Nanonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed when I tried using the spray and it didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3 pack of Febreze and love the scent. I just tried using one of them and the trigger does not work. The other two work fine. It took me this long to review it was three bottles and I just tried using this one.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hales

customer_reviews.title: THE SCENT IS NOT THE SAME!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Absolutely terrible. I have purchased this exact same product before, in the Crisp Clean scent (which smelled like Fabric Softener) so I purchased it here. While the bottles are slightly different, all the information is the same, wording is all the same, scent is listed on both items as Crisp Clean, but this one....UGH. Absolutely AWFUL. I will NOT purchase again, and NOW I have 3 bottles of this crap that I CANNOT use!! Wish I could give ZERO stars.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Settgast

customer_reviews.title: Covers any scent
customer_reviews.text: First discovered this product at work where we all share one bathroom. So this spray is perfect for that situation. I ordered the 3 pack for my home and it works wonders. Completely eliminates any odors and leaves the air smelling crisp.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Covers up Loud Odors
customer_reviews.text: Covers up odors with a slightly peach scent. Works well. You only need a little bit! Those complaining about the scent being overwhelming probably sprayed too much.
customer_reviews.author: mystuff

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the good looking container . Easy to use. It directed the spay upwards. Doesn't have an over powering scent. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Orchid Lover

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhhhhhh
customer_reviews.text: Good Stuff, eliminates orders on contact.....I don't care what you're trying to cover up(unless it's skunk odor)this stuff is concentrated and it smells great & you don't need much.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I love this spray! I just bought another pack. This has a great scent & I love that it’s double strength so I don’t have to spray so much. Excellent product which I recommend. I’ve been using it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: McSusie

customer_reviews.title: Love this scent!
customer_reviews.text: This supply has lasted me through two years of college. I absolutely love the scent, and so have my roommates. It's very bright, almost citris-y. I used to spray it on the part of my dorm hall where all the football players lived and it helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Murchie-Beyma

customer_reviews.title: fruit smell
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance does last long, however, the fruit fragrance is not refreshing. Can't place the exact scent but it is not floral, or fresh smelling. Not a good smell for a bathroom, bedroom living area or kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I can buy anywhere in same price and not in bulk so not a good deal. Actually after a long use I realized that it is not even eliminate the outdoor
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Kills that cat pan odor
customer_reviews.text: I got a very stinky couple of cats in a studio and this really freshens things up when they do what they do.
customer_reviews.author: Eve H. Tapscott

customer_reviews.title: Is this Pledge?
customer_reviews.text: I buy Febreeze for the good smell, this citrus concoction smells like a mixture of Pledge, cleaning supplies, and a hospital.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: replaces the bad smell, with.. a different smell
customer_reviews.text: not favorite smell for anyone in the house. HOWEVER, it may smell better than what you're trying to hide. it does REPLACE one smell with another. but this smell is not so nice. use a little or you will choke.
customer_reviews.author: diydiy

customer_reviews.title: Scent is overwhelming
customer_reviews.text: This scent is incredibly overwhelming, makes me nauseous at times. I prefer a lighter scent. It's way too heavy and lingers too long, not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and the fragrance lingers. Only need to spray a little so the spray bottle will last. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Knox Family

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice light citrus fresh scent, doesn't cover odors, it seems to nix them
customer_reviews.author: Itpaystotalk

customer_reviews.title: My Product Delivered to Wrong address
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered to wrong address on my premises. I'm sure it's great but would like it delivered to me. The delivery picture is not my door.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: this heavy duty spray, really works a lot better than the normal...smell is not overbearing and really cleans the air
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: I wanted fresh clean unscented. Mango, I think.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted just the 2x odor eliminating fresh scent for my salon that I had gotten in the past. WRONG..way to fruity. I won’t be using it and can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Odor eliminator
customer_reviews.text: I’m in a skilled care unit and the girl next door has the most.awful. I had one of the CNAs spray my room the hallway and her room. What a relief
customer_reviews.author: WALTZING MATILDA

product_meta.title: Febreze Air Freshener Heavy Duty Spray, Odor Eliminator, Crisp Clean, 8.8 Oz (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: Style:Air Freshener Heavy DutyFebreze AIR doesn't just mask odors, it cleans away odors with OdorClear Technology, leaving your air with a light, fresh scent. So when something stinky gets in your way, reach for Febreze AIR to eliminate odors on the spot. Spray the air in a sweeping motion throughout the entire room to clean away odors from everyday pet and bathroom smells to stubborn smoke and leftover cooking odors. With Febreze AIR freshener, you can clean odors out and invite freshness in.
feature_bullets: Doesn't just mask, cleans away odors with OdorClear Technology
Febreze AIR (formerly Febreze Air Effects) cleans away odors and freshens with a light, fresh scent that's never overpowering
Use Febreze AIR in entryways, bathrooms, laundry rooms, closets, or any room
Tell tough odors to take a hike with up to 2X odor-eliminating power** and a light scent (**vs base Febreze)
100% natural propellant is safe to use around cats and dogs but, as with other air care products, do not use around birds

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
